name: Han Solo and the Last Crusade WIP
name_original: Han Solo and the Last Crusade WIP
description:
This is the first chapter of this Star Wars fangame. When I finish it I will make it also downloadable as an offline file.

It uses youtube videos as soundtrack so the first time it will ask your permission for popups (the youtube page opens in a new window) and then it will be an advertisement (hopefully the first time) so you need to reload the crawl page again.

Be sure to close the "music window" after :)
